ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] twisting 5, added note
ygData.msgSnippet: A great bard does not need to twist 5 songs.  A bard who twists 3 or more songs knows what he is doing and is playing his character well.  Playing your
ygData.messageBody:
A great bard does not need to twist 5 songs. A bard who twists 3 or more
songs knows what he is doing and is playing his character well. Playing
your character well has nothing to do with how much expensive computer
equipment you can afford or how good your equipment is.

Faras Tar'Linedhel
52 Minstrel (Retired)
Sacred Brotherhood of the Wolf
-----Original Message-----
From: Katye and Brandon [mailto:landmax13@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 13, 2002 10:23 PM
To: Bard List
Subject: [eqbards] twisting 5, added note


The guy did say he had a great connection...

which I have a mediocre connection, cable, but mediocre...

but STILL

Raub
